title: Minimum Cost For Tickets
content:
In a country popular for train travel, you have planned some train travelling one year in advance.  The days of the year that you will travel is given as an array .  Each day is an integer from 1 to 365.
Train tickets are sold in 3 different ways:

a 1-day pass is sold for  dollars;
a 7-day pass is sold for  dollars;
a 30-day pass is sold for  dollars.

The passes allow that many days of consecutive travel.  For example, if we get a 7-day pass on day 2, then we can travel for 7 days: day 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8.
Return the minimum number of dollars you need to travel every day in the given list of .
